Name: kleineg
AboutMe:
Eli Klein is a software developer working on prediction tools in an engineering field, which support product development and customer sales. He believes that the ability to combine computer based simulation modeling with data analysis helps drive business needs, and that his skills and the work he puts into honing them makes him well placed to be able to assist his customer increase performance. He graduated with a B.S. in Mathematics and minored in Physics.

He is currently in an Accelerated Masters program in Systems Engineering through the University of Virginia.
